p: During this pandemic, links between SARS-CoV-2 and ACS have not been established yet and a common guidance on how to handle ACS in Covid-19 and non-Covid-19 patients is needed. The aim of this review is to shed some light on those issues, analyzing possible physiopathological links between Covid-19 and ACS and evaluating the best strategy to balance optimal ACS management and infectious risks related to Covid-19 outbreak.
